########### CMakeMaker autogenerated file ###########
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.6)



set(cpp_files
  ./source/main.cc
  ./source/example_system.cc
  ./source/example_system.h
)

source_group(source FILES
  ./source/main.cc
  ./source/example_system.cc
  ./source/example_system.h
)

add_executable(ecs_game_engine WIN32 ${cpp_files})

include_directories(ecs_game_engine
  ../slib_core/./include/
  ../slib_core/./include/math/
  ../slib_core/./include/state_machine/
  ../slib_core/./include/templates/patterns/
  ../slib_core/./include/templates/types/
  ../slib_core/include
  ../slib_core/include/math
  ../slib_core/include/state_machine
  ../slib_core/include/templates/patterns
  ../slib_core/include/templates/types
  ../slib_graphics/./include/
  ../slib_graphics/./include/component/
  ../slib_graphics/./include/system/canera/
  ../slib_graphics/include
  ../slib_graphics/include/component
  ../slib_graphics/include/system/canera
  ../slib_input/./include/
  ../slib_input/./include/component/
  ../slib_input/include
  ../slib_input/include/component
  ../slib_physics/./include/component/
  ../slib_physics/include/component
  ../source_shared
  ./source
)

target_link_libraries(ecs_game_engine
  core
  graphics
  input
  physics
  tbb
  libpthread.so
)

add_dependencies(ecs_game_engine ALL_PRE_BUILD)
